patthana8.28:4.1: Naganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:4.2: Naganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:4.3: Naganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.28:5.1: Naganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:5.2: Naganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:5.3: Naganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.28:6.1: Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:6.2: Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:6.3: Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.28:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
